title: Git and Version Control System
description: Learn about git and version control management on windows os.

lectures.title: What is Version Management
lectures.description: An introduction to version management and version management systems

lectures.title: Introduction to Git
lectures.description: This session deals with What is is git? How you work with git?

lectures.title: Installation of Git
lectures.description: This session covers How to download & install git on your machine

lectures.title: Playing with Git
lectures.description: This session covers Creating a New repository (git init) Adding files to Staging Commit a change set.

lectures.title: Branching in git
lectures.description: This session covers Recap of part 4 What is branching in git How commits are made with multiple branches

lectures.title: Branching Demo I
lectures.description: This session covers Create New branch How branch pointers work Switching from one point to other point

lectures.title: Branching Demo II
lectures.description: This session describes Git merging when a non-conflicting commits have been made in destination branch Git merging when a conflicting commit/s have been made in destination branch

lectures.title: Introduction to GitHub
lectures.description: This session describes Introduction to GitHub (Web based Git repository hosting service)

lectures.title: Introduction to Remote Repositories
lectures.description: This session describes Introduction to Remote Repositories

lectures.title: Remote Repository Demo I
lectures.description: This session basically gives a bird's eye view of Git clone Git pull Git push.

lectures.title: Remote Repository Demo II (Branching)
lectures.description: This session describes Creating Local/Remote branches Push & Pull changes

lectures.title: TortoiseGit Installation
lectures.description: This session starts with a brief overview of Git GUI clients Download & Install TortoiseGit

lectures.title: TortoiseGit Demo I
lectures.description: This session gives an overview of Clone, Push, Pull Fast Forward Merge Merge with conflict case.

lectures.title: TortoiseGit Demo II
lectures.description: This session deals with Creating local repository, creating branches, merging scenarios testing gitignore practical scenario.

lectures.title: Git with Visual Studio
lectures.description: This session deals with How to use git with Visual Studio

lectures.title: Quick Introduction with Bitbucket
lectures.description: This session discusses This gives a quick introduction of bitbucket + It is for beginners.
